abstract: The biggest German bank, which posted an 18 percent increase in profit for the first quarter, said it would sell $3.65 billion in new shares to bolster its capital reserves.
snippet: The biggest German bank, which posted an 18 percent increase in profit for the first quarter, said it would sell $3.65 billion in new shares to bolster its capital reserves.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Posts a Profit and Agrees to Raise Its Capital Reserves
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Posts a Profit and Agrees to Raise Its Capital Reserves
